title: Researchers Find Way to Shut Down Cryptominer Campaigns Using Bad Shares and XMRogue
description: Cybersecurity researchers have detailed two novel methods that can be used to disrupt cryptocurrency mining botnets. The methods take advantage of the design of various common mining topologies in order to shut down the mining process, Akamai said in a new report published today.
